Pro Bono Services

Supporting charities and not-for-profits with sustainable digital marketing strategies that create lasting impact.

At Green Orbit Digital, we are deeply committed to supporting charities and not-for-profits that align with our values of sustainability and positive change. Through our pro-bono services, we aim to contribute meaningfully to the missions of these organisations, helping them amplify their impact while ensuring that our expertise serves the greater good.

Our pro-bono strategy focuses on partnerships that drive progress towards the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), particularly SDG 17 – Partnership for the Goals. By working closely with charities and civil society organisations, we ensure that our contributions are both sustainable and impactful, offering tailored support that aligns with the unique needs of each charity.

We carefully select our pro-bono projects, engaging in transparent discussions with organisations to define the scope, capacity, and expectations from the outset. This collaborative approach ensures that we deliver effective, results-driven support, empowering our charity partners to further their missions and create lasting, positive change.

How Green Orbit Supports Charities

  • Strategic digital marketing guidance for campaigns and projects
  • SEO and content optimisation to amplify online presence
  • Sustainability and ESG communications aligned with organisational goals
  • Support in reporting impact and engagement metrics
  • Capacity building and knowledge transfer to internal teams

Our Partnership Approach

We work collaboratively with charity partners to understand their unique challenges and objectives. Each project begins with a transparent discussion about scope, timelines, and resources. Our goal is to ensure that the support we provide is not only effective but sustainable, creating long-term value and measurable impact.

By embedding our expertise in digital strategy, sustainability communications, and analytics, we empower charities to reach wider audiences, improve engagement, and achieve their mission objectives more efficiently.

Interested in Pro Bono Support?

If your organisation aligns with our mission and sustainability values, get in touch to discuss a potential partnership and how Green Orbit Digital can support your initiatives.

Contact Us
Green Orbit Digital

A full-service digital marketing agency specialising in the space and technology sectors, delivering data-driven strategies that drive growth, engagement, and impact. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to optimise campaigns, create compelling content, and implement sustainable digital solutions that amplify their mission and reach.
